metadata.title: CVE-2016-9108 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the js_regcomp function in regexp.c in ArtifexSoftware, Inc. MuJS before commit b6de34ac6d8bb7dd5461c57940acfbd3ee7fd93eallows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via acrafted regular expression.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
